content.description: Generates an expanding damaging zone. Damage multiplied by Area.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 6 with **SpellString** at level 6 and **SpellStrike** at level 6 to make **SpellStrom**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by getting SpellStream to Level 6.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base
(2) Damage +5, Area +20%
(3) Duration +0.3, Area +20%
(4) Damage +5, Area +20%
(5) Duration +0.3, Area +20%
(6) Damage +5, Area +20%

content.title: SpellStream - Foscari DLC
